FY2021.Q31: RF Human Resources supports the University's research missions by providing exceptional, efficient, accurate and timely services and resources to our customers.
FY2021.Q32: RFHR is committed to: constructive employee relations in a diverse and multicultural work environment; a working environment that encourages open, honest dialogue between employees and managers; equal employment opportunity and affirmative action; ethical, consistent, accountable and legal management practices.
FY2021.Q81: Implement additional online employee and supervisory training modules.
FY2021.Q91: Continue to develop and offer a variety of human resource outreach programs.
FY2021.Q101: Continue to monitor and administer frequent changing COVID-19 legislation as it applies to the RF @ UA employee population.

FY2122.Q31: RF Human Resources supports the University's research missions by providing exceptional, efficient, accurate and timely services and resources to our customers.
FY2122.Q32: RFHR is committed to: constructive employee relations in a diverse and multicultural work environment; a working environment that encourages open, honest dialogue between employees and managers; equal employment opportunity and affirmative action; ethical, consistent, accountable and legal management practices.
FY2122.Q61: Implement additional online employee and supervisory training modules.
FY2122.Q62: Implementation of training with third-party vendor; coordination with RF SUNY; certification and reporting modules.
FY2122.Q63:
Review of training module; ease of access; 
100% training; report tracking with certifications provided upon completion.
FY2122.Q71: Continue to develop and offer a variety of human resource outreach programs.
FY2122.Q72: Re-focusing priorities for entire RFHR staff.
FY2122.Q81: Continue to monitor and administer frequent changing COVID-19 legislation as it applies to the RF @ UA employee population.
FY2122.Q82: Shifting staff priorities and assignments to accomplish the additional work required to administer: RF employee telework documentation, frequently changing NYS leave regulations & programs, enhanced unemployment benefits, employee health & child care leave requests, return to work guidelines, and Contact Tracing.
FY2122.Q83: Ensure seamless remote administration of all RFHR operations during COVID-19.
FY2122.1819Mission: RF Human Resources supports the University's research missions by providing; exceptional, efficient, accurate and timely services and resources to our customers.
FY2122.1819Vision: RFHR is committed to: constructive employee relations in a diverse and multicultural work environment; a working environment that encourages open, honest dialogue between employees and managers; equal employment opportunity and affirmative action; ethical, consistent, accountable and legal management practices.
FY2122.1819Goal1:
Implement mandatory annual employee Sexual Harassment Training by
fall 2019.
FY2122.1819Activities1:
Implementation of training with third-party vendor; coordination with
SUNY HR; certification and reporting modules; summer employee
training module.
FY2122.1819Metrics1:
Review of training module; ease of access; 100% training; report tracking
with certifications provided upon completion.
FY2122.1819Goal2: Develop and offer a variety of human resource outreach programs.
FY2122.1819Metrics2: Number of programs offered; Number of attendees; attendee satisfaction
FY2122.1819Goal3: Complete E-Time Reporting final module upgrade.
FY2122.1819Metrics3: Accuracy of data into E-Time module.
FY2122.1819Goal1:Results: 100% of RF population completed and certified the required training.
FY2122.1819Goal2:Results: Rolled out on-site Graduate Employee Benefits Training with extremely positive feedback from the attendees from multiple areas of campus.
